structure.unit: ARTICLE CLV. BONITA ESTATES MANSIONS SOUTH STREET LIGHTING SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT

text.section: The area or boundaries of this proposed special taxing district are as follows:

A portion of, Township 56 South, Range 39 East, Miami-Dade County, Florida (a.k.a. Bonita Estates Mansions South, Tentative Plat #T-23501); being more particularly described as follows:
The SE ¼ of the NE ¼ of the SE ¼ of said;
Less
Begin at the southwest corner of the SE ¼ of the NE ¼ of the SE ¼ of said; thence N 89° 10′ 13″ E for 60.00 feet; thence N 01° 02′ 16″ W for 331.41 feet to a point of curvature of a circular curve to the left, having a radius of 160.00 feet, a central angle of 46° 24′ 45″, for an arc length of 129.61 feet to a point of tangency; thence N 47° 27′ 01″ W for 14.25 feet to a point of intersection with the west line of the SE ¼ of the NE ¼ of the SE ¼ of said; thence S 01° 02′ 29″ E for 456.89 feet to the Point-of-Beginning.
The area and geographical location of this proposed special taxing district are shown on the Exhibit A map or sketch, and made a part herein by reference.
